summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeKitsch Hair Wax Slick Stick. Flyaway & frizz control. Hassle-free styling. Clean formula - made with vegan waxes & plant-based ingredients.
details: DetailsBenefitsStyling & FinishingFeaturesFlyaway & frizz control - Tame stubborn strands & achieve a polished, sleek style.Easy to use - Convenient solid stick format allows for effortless touch-ups on the go.Hassle-free styling - Easy to comb through & wash out with no residue left behind.Strong hold & non-sticky - Provides long-lasting hold of hair gel without unwanted texture or greasiness.Item 2621152How To UseRemove the cap and push the bottom of the Hair Wax Stick up to reveal wax.Apply wax directly to your hair, focusing on areas you want to slick back & smooth out.Use your fingers or a soft brush to set wax into place for a sleek, flyawa-free style.Put the cap back on and gently push down.IngredientsLauryl Laurate, Maranta Arundinacea Root Extract, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Wax, Kaolin, Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Glyceryl Stearate, Polyhydroxystearic Acid, Water, Polyquaternium-69, Silica, Tocopheryl Acetate, Phenoxyethanol, Alcohol Denat., Butylene Glycol, Iodopropynyl Butylcarbamate
how_to_use: Remove the cap and push the bottom of the Hair Wax Stick up to reveal wax.Apply wax directly to your hair, focusing on areas you want to slick back & smooth out.Use your fingers or a soft brush to set wax into place for a sleek, flyawa-free style.Put the cap back on and gently push down.

reviews.headline: Handlebar mustache
reviews.comments: My husband uses this on his handlebar mustache, it works great!

reviews.headline: Love this
reviews.comments: Love this product. Works well and leaves hair soft and not sticky!

reviews.headline: Clumpy
reviews.comments: Works for the most part...leaves white clumsy pieces in hair

reviews.headline: an okay hair stick
reviews.comments: One of the worst hair sticks I have tried (and I have tried a lot!). The product does not glide on and is very difficult to apply. Often when it was applied it would leave white chunks in my hair that were difficult to blend in. I loved the idea of the packaging, however it can be a little hard to use.

reviews.headline: I recommend this product over a few others I have tried.
reviews.comments: This is great product because of its easy way to handle, and it glides on easy and it washes out of your hair.

reviews.headline: Styling with greasy hair has the same effect
reviews.comments:
I have really dark, almost black, brown hair.

To start, the stick was so hard to push up. I had to put it on top of another bottle and push the wax tube down over the other bottle as extra leverage to push the wax out.

While applying, little pieces of wax get left behind that look like dandruff. These were easily brushed out, but some of the finer pieces look like dandruff.

It‚Ä¶ works. My hair looks greasy, and after 4 hours I have a few flyaways. Its not crunchy or sticky on my hair.

reviews.headline: Mediocre
reviews.comments: This is a good product but there are things I would change. I was looking for a product liek Bedheads slick stick but this product is very hard to put into slick backs. I do like that it's non scentedn

reviews.headline: I love it it is really nice and quick and easy
reviews.comments: it is great

reviews.headline: Please hold off üò≠
reviews.comments: I play volleyball so I love my slickbacks so I went to ulta and picked this out to do so. I went home and put it on. Well it worked but leaves alot of whiteness on my brown hair, also hard to wash out and makes your hair look greasy :( dont buy it please!

reviews.headline: Please hold off üò≠

reviews.headline: wax is stuck
reviews.comments: i cant push the stick up & get the wax out! useless!

reviews.headline: Wouldn't buy again
reviews.comments: Left flakes in my hair

reviews.headline: not worth it
reviews.comments: it was not smooth. very waxy feeling. and hair did not stick

reviews.headline: Not worth
reviews.comments: Aside from the stick being nearly impossible to push up, this product left my hair very waxy with visible marks. It only partially smoothed down the hair as expected, and the hassle to clean up residue is enough to make me reach for other products instead.

reviews.headline: would not recommend
reviews.comments: i got this product to lay baby hair and stop frizz-ish stuff at the top if my head. instrad of doing that it left white chunks in my hair. 2 stars.

reviews.headline: would not recommend
reviews.comments: i got this product to lay baby hair and stop frizz-ish stuff at the top if my head. instrad of doing that it left white chunks in my hair. 2 stars.

reviews.headline: Would give 0 stars if I could
reviews.comments: Save your money & don't buy

reviews.headline: Defective
reviews.comments: Maybe mine is defective, but when I try to push the wax up out of the stick, it will not budge. I've pushed it on various objects in my home and it's still not moving.

reviews.headline: Waste
reviews.comments: Does not work whatsoever

reviews.headline: Chunks of product left in hair
reviews.comments: If you don't mind taking a paper towel and then a brush to comb out all of the leftover chunks that it leaves....then it might be for you?  Keep in mind your brush will be full of product as well

faceoff_positive.comments: I love my hair wax stick from Kit.sch because I have ornery hair. I also have multiple "COWLICKS " that are very stubborn and have a mind of their own. Since 2019 my mostly white hair became in terrible condition. It was long and scraggily and breaking off‚Ä¶ it was in pretty bad shape. On top of this my hair has always grown downwards toward my face. It was a mess and sort of depressing. I got a bob which was a start. I kept using the same shampoos and conditioner so my hair did not get any better. I ordered some shampoo and conditioners from "Kit.sch" and got my hair cute short the next day. The interesting thing is I think I shopped and ordered late at night and I propbably should have ordered the products with bioten in them but in error did not. I have been so amazed that my part lines are filling in. I no longer have wads of hair to pick up after a shampoo. The hair wax stick helps me ease my wonky cowlick hair back where I want it every morning after I get up. This product works very well for my needs. I think it being in a stick for makes it easy for me to apply. Eventually I will try the products for white/gray hair.
faceoff_positive.headline: "Kit.sch" Hair wax stick.

faceoff_negative.comments: I thought this would be a great substitute for hair spray.  Not for me!  First of all, I had a difficult time pushing the wax stick up so I could use it.  Then, when I finally managed to get it pushed up (using more than just my fingers), it seemed too soft, and left a trail of white wax in my hair.  So, I refrigerated it for 2 days and tried it again.  Same problem!  And I have light-colored hair, but I still had to work it into the hair so that it wouldn't show.  Frankly, I do not understand all the rave reviews about this product.
faceoff_negative.headline: Not as Described
